name: Google Drive
description: Access and search Google Drive files, read document contents, and manage files. Supports Google Docs, Sheets, and other Drive file types with OAuth 2.0 authentication for secure access.

inputs.label: Google OAuth Client ID
inputs.description: OAuth 2.0 Client ID from Google Cloud Console for authenticating with Google Drive API.

obtain.instructions: Go to Google Cloud Console > APIs & Services > Credentials. Create an OAuth 2.0 Client ID for a Desktop application. Enable the Google Drive API in your project.

inputs.label: Google OAuth Client Secret
inputs.description: OAuth 2.0 Client Secret from Google Cloud Console.

auth.instructions: Requires Google OAuth 2.0 credentials. Create a project in Google Cloud Console, enable the Google Drive API, and create OAuth 2.0 Desktop credentials. The server will guide you through the OAuth flow on first use.

prerequisites: Google Cloud project with Drive API enabled
